arts.ttl: The 4 most enchanting villages in Mallorca according to a prestigious magazine
arts.sum: Beyond its rich cultural history, this small town in the Serra de Tramuntana enchants with its charm and is one of the must-see places in Mallorca. Fornalutx, considered for many years one of the most beautiful villages in Mallorca, also appears on National Geographicâ€™s list.

Osasuna and Mallorca are both on the same points in La Liga this season, sitting in eighth and ninth place respectively. Osasuna are just ahead on goal difference, with their impressive home form maki...

arts.ttl: Mallorca weather: Big freeze grips Mallorca: Temperatures drop below zero
arts.sum: The forecast is for overcast skies with rain and showers, tending to become mostly cloudy in the afternoon, except in the north of Mallorca, where there may be some isolated showers or storms. Night-time temperatures will continue to fall with the possibility of some light frost.

arts.ttl: Freezing in Mallorca! -3 degrees Centigrade overnight!
arts.sum: It was literally freezing in Mallorca overnight on Thursday into Friday with a minimum temperature of -3 degrees Centigrade being registered in Escorca, the coldest temperature of the year so far. Even Palma was left shivering overnight with a minimum temperature of 1 degrees Centigrade at Palma airport, not the usual warm welcome which you expect when arriving on the island.
